import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SubjectService } from '../service/subject.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-subject-edit', templateUrl: './subject-edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./subject-edit.component.scss'] }) export class SubjectEditComponent implements OnInit { name:string = ''; constructor(private SubjectService: SubjectService){} ngOnInit () { this.name = this.SubjectService.getNameEdit() } UpdateSubject(name:string){ this } }
